content.title: UI of Recipients List Form
content.body:
1. From the bottom-left corner of Iris, navigate to the Default Library.
  2. Click the search icon.
  3. In the search bar that appears, enter Recipient.
  4. From the results, under RecipientsWeb collection, select RecipientList.
  5. Drag the RecipientList collection onto frmRecipients on the canvas.
  6. From the top of the Iris canvas, select the Design tab open the forms in the Design view.
